user.description:
Set up your Better Thermostat to integrate with Home Assistant
**If you need more info: https://better-thermostat.org/configuration/new_device**

data.name: Name
data.off_temperature: The outdoor temperature when the thermostat turns off
data.window_off_delay: Delay before the thermostat turns off/on when window is open/closed
data.outdoor_sensor: Select outdoor temperature sensor if available
data.weather: Home Assistant weather entity providing outdoor temperature

data.calibration_round: Should the calibration be rounded to the nearest
data.heat_auto_swapped: If Auto means Heat for your TRV and you need to swap it
data.child_lock: Ignore all inputs on the TRV like a child lock
data.homaticip: If you use HomaticIP, enable this to slow down requests to prevent the duty cycle
data.valve_maintenance: If your thermostat has no own maintenance mode, use this one
data.no_off_system_mode: If your TRV can't handle Off mode, enable to use target temperature of 5°C instead

data_description.calibration_mode:
How the calibration should be calculated
***Normal***: In this mode the TRV internal temperature sensor is fixed by the external temperature sensor.
***Aggresive***: In this mode the TRV internal temperature sensor is fixed by the external temperature sensor but set much lower/higher for a quicker boost.
***AI Time Based***: In this mode the TRV internal temperature sensor is fixed by the external temperature sensor, but the value is calculated by a custom algorithm to improve the TRV internal algorithm.
data_description.calibration:
How the calibration should be applied to the TRV (Target temp or offset)
***Target Temperature Based***: Apply the calibration to the target temperature.
***Offset Based***: Apply the calibration to the offset.

confirm.title: Confirm adding a Better Thermostat
confirm.description:
You are about to add `{name}` to Home Assistant.
With {trv} as the real thermostat

error.no_off_mode:
Your device is special and has no Off mode :(
It will work anyway, but you have to create a automation to fit your specials based on the device events

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one Better Thermostat for each real one is allowed
abort.no_devices_found: No thermostat entity found. Make sure you have a climate entity set up in Home Assistant
